greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Dirichlet inverse of sigma_4 function (A001159).
comment: sigma_4(n) is the sum of the 4th powers of the divisors of n (A001159).
reference: Tom M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 39.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^1) = -1 - p^4, a(p^2) = p^4, a(p^e) = 0 for e>=3. - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 27 2005
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := If[e == 1, -p^4 - 1, If[e == 2, p^4, 0]]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 16 2020 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, moebius(n/d)*moebius(d)*d^4); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 06 2018
(PARI) for(n=1, 100, print1(direuler(p=2, n, (1 - X)*(1 - p^4*X))[n], ", ")) \\ _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 16 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 08 2000
